comments.body: I think I'll stick with the linking to the EOS page, rather than the anchor as I hope the "Connections Available" tables explains the differences between eAPI and NX-API

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@      - "Starting with Ansible 2.5 we recommend using C(connection: network_cli) and C(become: yes)."
      - This option is only required if you are using eAPI.
      - For more information please see the L(EOS Platform Options guide, ../network/user_guide/platform_eos.html).
      - HORIZONTALLINE
      - Instructs the module to enter privileged mode on the remote device
